content.question: Let <math alttext="R" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>R</mi></mrow></mstyle></math> be the region enclosed by the graphs of <math alttext="y equals, 5 x minus, x to the fourth power" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>y</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>5</mn><mi>x</mi><mo>−</mo><msup><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>4</mn></mrow></msup></mrow></mstyle></math> and the horizontal line <math alttext="y equals, three halves" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>y</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></mfrac></mrow></mstyle></math>. The <math alttext="x" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow></mstyle></math>-coordinates of the points of intersection of the graphs are <math alttext="x sub 1" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><msub><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>1</mn></mrow></msub></mrow></mstyle></math> and <math alttext="x sub 2" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><msub><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msub></mrow></mstyle></math>, where <math alttext="x sub 1, is less than x sub 2" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><msub><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>1</mn></mrow></msub><mo><</mo><msub><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msub></mrow></mstyle></math>. Which of the following gives the volume of the solid generated when region <math alttext="R" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>R</mi></mrow></mstyle></math> is revolved about the horizontal line <math alttext="y equals, three halves" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>y</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></mfrac></mrow></mstyle></math> ?

choices.label: <math alttext="the integral from, x sub 1, to x sub 2, of, open parenthesis, 5 x minus, x to the fourth power, minus three halves, close parenthesis, squared, d x" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mrow><mstyle><mrow><mrow><msubsup><mrow><mo>∫</mo></mrow><mrow><msub><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>1</mn></mrow></msub></mrow><mrow><msub><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msub></mrow></msubsup><msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mn>5</mn><mi>x</mi><mo>−</mo><msup><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>4</mn></mrow></msup><mo>−</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></mfrac><mo>)</mo></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup></mrow><mi>d</mi><mi>x</mi></mrow></mstyle></mrow></mstyle></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="the integral from, x sub 1, to x sub 2, of, open parenthesis, open parenthesis, 5 x minus, x to the fourth power, close parenthesis, squared, minus, open parenthesis, three halves, close parenthesis, squared, close parenthesis, d x" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mstyle><mrow><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mrow><mstyle><mrow><mrow><msubsup><mrow><mo>∫</mo></mrow><mrow><msub><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>1</mn></mrow></msub></mrow><mrow><msub><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msub></mrow></msubsup><mo>(</mo><msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mn>5</mn><mi>x</mi><mo>−</mo><msup><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>4</mn></mrow></msup><mo>)</mo></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup><mo>−</mo><msup><mrow><mrow><mo>(</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></mfrac><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup><mo>)</mo></mrow><mi>d</mi><mi>x</mi></mrow></mstyle></mrow></mstyle></mrow></mstyle></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="pi times, the integral from, x sub 1, to x sub 2, of, open parenthesis, 5 x minus, x to the fourth power, minus three halves, close parenthesis, squared, d x" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mstyle><mrow><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mrow><mstyle><mrow><mrow><msubsup><mrow><mi>π</mi><mo>∫</mo></mrow><mrow><msub><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>1</mn></mrow></msub></mrow><mrow><msub><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msub></mrow></msubsup><msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mn>5</mn><mi>x</mi><mo>−</mo><msup><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>4</mn></mrow></msup><mo>−</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></mfrac><mo>)</mo></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup></mrow><mi>d</mi><mi>x</mi></mrow></mstyle></mrow></mstyle></mrow></mstyle></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="pi times, the integral from, x sub 1, to x sub 2, of, open parenthesis, open parenthesis, 5 x minus, x to the fourth power, close parenthesis, squared, minus, open parenthesis, three halves, close parenthesis, squared, close parenthesis, d x" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mstyle><mrow><mstyle><mrow><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mrow><mstyle><mrow><mrow><msubsup><mrow><mi>π</mi><mo>∫</mo></mrow><mrow><msub><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>1</mn></mrow></msub></mrow><mrow><msub><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msub></mrow></msubsup><mo>(</mo><msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mn>5</mn><mi>x</mi><mo>−</mo><msup><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>4</mn></mrow></msup><mo>)</mo></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup><mo>−</mo><msup><mrow><mrow><mo>(</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></mfrac><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup><mo>)</mo></mrow><mi>d</mi><mi>x</mi></mrow></mstyle></mrow></mstyle></mrow></mstyle></mrow></mstyle></mrow></mstyle></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="pi times, the integral from, x sub 1, to x sub 2, of, open parenthesis, 5 x minus, x to the fourth power, minus three halves, close parenthesis, squared, d x" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mstyle><mrow><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mrow><mstyle><mrow><mrow><msubsup><mrow><mi>π</mi><mo>∫</mo></mrow><mrow><msub><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>1</mn></mrow></msub></mrow><mrow><msub><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msub></mrow></msubsup><msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mn>5</mn><mi>x</mi><mo>−</mo><msup><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>4</mn></mrow></msup><mo>−</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></mfrac><mo>)</mo></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup></mrow><mi>d</mi><mi>x</mi></mrow></mstyle></mrow></mstyle></mrow></mstyle></mrow></mstyle></math>

topic.text: 8.10: Volume with Disc Method - Revolving Around Other Axes

skill.text: Skill 2.D: Identify how mathematical characteristics or properties of functions are related in different representations.
